article: A boy lost his arms in an accident and had to depend on his brother for almost everything. His younger brother became his _ , never leaving him alone for years. Except for writing with his _ , he was completely unable to do anything in his life. One night, his brother accompanied him into the _ and went back to wait. But being so tired, his younger brother fell _ , leaving him in the toilet for two hours. As the two brothers grew _ , they had different opinions about many things and often _ . His brother wanted to _ from him to live his own life. Knowing this, he was heart-broken and didn't know what to do. A similar misfortune happened to a girl. One night her _ , who suffered from mental illness, _ . So her father went out looking for her mother, leaving her alone at home. She tried to _ a meal for her parents, but only to overturn the stove, resulting in a _ , which took her hands away. Though her elder sister, who was studying in another city, showed her _ to help her, she made up her mind to be completely _ . And she made it. One day, the boy and the girl were both _ to appear on a television interview program. They both were asked to _ something on a piece of paper with their toes. The boy wrote: My brother's arms are my arms; while the girl wrote: Broken wings, flying hearts.
